title: Film Theory: The Dark Truth of Wanda's STOLEN Children! (WandaVision)
author: The Film Theorists
description:
Subscribe to never miss a Film Theory! ► http://bit.ly/1dI8VBH      

"For the children." That's the phrase that keeps coming up in WandaVsion. For a while, I thought that meant the missing children of the town but last week we got to see them again. Then I thought it meant HER children, Billy and Tommy, whose mysterious appearance has left many questions so far unanswered. Theorists, there is SO MUCH to unpack when it comes to the Hex, Wanda's kids, and what reality actually means anymore. Get ready to get mystical!

Get yourself some Theory Wear! ► https://bit.ly/2UkxCv0

Don't miss a Film Theory! ► http://bit.ly/1dI8VBH

localize.description:
订阅《电影理论》，永远不会错过《电影理论》! ► http://bit.ly/1dI8VBH      

"为了孩子"。这句话在WandaVsion中不断出现。有一阵子，我以为那是指小镇上失踪的孩子们，但上周我们又看到了他们。然后我以为是指她的孩子们，比利和汤米，他们的神秘出现让很多问题至今没有答案。理论家们，当涉及到哈克斯，旺达的孩子，以及现实中的意义时，有太多的问题需要解开。准备好接受神秘的考验吧！

"爲了孩子"。這句話在WandaVsion中不斷出現。有一陣子，我以爲那是指小鎮上失蹤的孩子們，但上週我們又看到了他們。然後我以爲是指她的孩子們，比利和湯米，他們的神祕出現讓很多問題至今沒有答案。理論家們，當涉及到哈克斯，旺達的孩子，以及現實中的意義時，有太多的問題需要解開。準備好接受神祕的考驗吧！
